<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Get socials using Talent ID","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"accounts":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"identifier":{"type":"string","description":"The identifier of the account"},"source":{"type":"string","enum":["wallet","farcaster","lens","self","talent_protocol","github","linkedin","x_twitter","worldcoin"],"description":"The source of the account"},"owned_since":{"type":["string","null"],"format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp of when the account was owned"},"connected_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp of when the account was connected"},"username":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The username of the account"}}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}

</StatusCodes>
